code.name: ACO_ID_NUM
code.label: Claim Accountable Care Organization (ACO) Identification Number

description.p: The field identifies the Accountable Care Organization (ACO) Identification Number.

code.name: ACTIONCD
code.label: FI or MAC Claim Action Code

description.p: The type of action requested by the intermediary to be taken on an institutional claim.

value.description: Original debit action (always a 1 for all regular bills)
